name: The Scaglietti
description:
"tranquility"

The Scaglietti the insurance company sends you, Domenico, to oversee the restoration of paintings supervised by professor Claudia Ascari. However, soon there appears to be evidence of a possible crime.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2009-03-20. It was written, produced and directed by mikey. The character art used first was created by Lonnie T. Brandt. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. HTML version done by Alte. Estimated completion time is 15 minutes.

The Scaglietti is game Nr. 16 of the Original 22.
